price: Os que amam mais a vida terrena que a Derradeira Vida e afastam os homens do caminho de Allah, buscando torná-lo tortuoso, esses estão em profundo descaminho.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَحِبُّونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجًاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yastaḥibbūna al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan ulāika fī ḍalālin baʿīdin
